properties.name: c2s.brms.guvnor.endpointAddress
properties.description: Specifies endpoint to use for connecting to BRMS Guvnor.

properties.name: c2s.brms.guvnor.serviceUsername
properties.description: Specifies username to use when accessing BRMS Guvnor service.

properties.name: c2s.brms.guvnor.servicePassword
properties.description: Specifies password to use when accessing BRMS Guvnor service.

properties.name: c2s.dss.validator.c-cda.r1
properties.description: Specifies endpoint to use for connecting to the documentValidator service to validate CCDA-r1 documents.

properties.name: c2s.dss.validator.c-cda.r2
properties.description: Specifies endpoint to use for connecting to the documentValidator service to validate CCDA-r2 documents.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.code
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'code' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.codeSystem
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'codeSystem' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.codeSystemName
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'codeSystemName' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.displayName
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'displayName' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.title
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'title' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.DocumentTaggerImpl.additionalSections.text
properties.description: Specifies value to use for 'text' attribute in additional section inserted into tagged document.

properties.name: c2s.dss.documentSegmentationImpl.defaultIsAudited
properties.description: Specifies if document segmentation should be audited by default.

properties.name: c2s.dss.documentSegmentationImpl.defaultIsAuditFailureByPass
properties.description: Specifies if audit failures for document segmentation should, by default, be bypassed and allow document segmentation to continue.

properties.name: c2s.dss.audit-service.host
properties.description: Specifies host running audit service which DSS should connect to for auditing.

properties.name: c2s.dss.audit-service.port
properties.description: Specifies port on host running audit service which DSS should connect to for auditing.
